page.title: 13ADVENTURE EDUCATION WEEK 2
page.content: {SAILING}We went sailing one day.I steered and went round in a circle,but then I got the hang of it.It felt funny.The sea went green when we went up the river.The we saw the S.S. Uganda, the old{Educational Cruise {ship.}She looked like a wedding cake with marmalade on,because there was rust on her.I saw a cormorant.It was brown.He was drying his wings.He was like a statue.When the boat swayed,you have to sway with it.We had to put the sails up and the boom hit me on the head.We went past a buoy that smelt horrible and we stopped at an island.When we got off the boat my legs felt funny.We had a good wind on the way home.
